body.p: Pieter van den Abeele comes home with nice award won for a multimedia system he developed, a report from the German LinuxTag event that just closed its doors after a successful four days, and AMD64 host accounts now available to Gentoo developers are the top news this week. The Gentoo Weekly Newsletter's this week also reports from the developer mailing list, and carries other of its usual sections, including the Bugzilla statistics and regular security announcements. Have fun reading the GWN.
